name: A Promise for Ox
description:
You made a promise for Ox. It's time to fulfill this promise.

This is a 3-day "project" and, technically, my first released game. I actually made a promise about releasing a game until the end of the year so I could push myself into finishing something, and this was the result of the promise.

Keep in mind this is a very simple project with kinda clunky controls/movement, but it was also a very nice experience to be able to put something out in the world.  If someone loses a couple of minutes shooting some skeletons because of me, it was worth it! :)

Controls

Directionals; Movement
WASD: Shoot fireball
E: Medic!11! (heals HP)
Space: Confirmations
